DOC.brief_summary: This record describe pool data three extension study : MK-0462-022 ( NCT00897949 ) ; MK-0462-025 ( NCT00899379 ) ; MK-0462-029 ( NCT00897104 ) . These study examine long-term safety efficacy rizatriptan use treatment acute migraine migraine recurrence .
DOC.brief_title: Long-Term Exposure Rizatriptan 5-mg 10-mg Oral Tablet ( Combined Extension Protocols MK-0462-022 , MK-0462-025 , MK-0462-029 )
DOC.criteria: Participant take part study MK0462022 , MK0462025 , MK0462029 History migraine headache
